description: Speed up your site and create a smoother viewing experience by loading images as visitors scroll down the screen, instead of all at once.
author: Automattic

scripts.build: pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-js
scripts.build-production: pnpm run distclean && pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run build-production-js
scripts.build-production-js: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production pnpm run build-js && pnpm run validate-es5 -- ./dist/
